graphql.query:
query customers {
    customers {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            firstName
            lastName
            gender
            dateOfBirth
            email
            phone
            notes
            password
            apiToken
            customerGroupId
            subscribedToNewsLetter
            isVerified
            token
            notes
            status
            customerGroup {
                id
                name
                code
                isUserDefined
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            addresses {
                id
                customerId
                companyName
                firstName
                lastName
                address1
                address2
                country
                state
                city
                postcode
                phone
                vatId
                addressType
                defaultAddress
            }
            defaultAddress {
                id
                companyName
                address1
                address2
                country
                state
                city
                postcode
                phone
            }
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

query customer {
    customer(id: 7) {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        dateOfBirth
        email
        phone
        notes
        password
        apiToken
        customerGroupId
        subscribedToNewsLetter
        isVerified
        token
        notes
        status
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        addresses {
            id
            customerId
            companyName
            firstName
            lastName
            address1
            address2
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
            vatId
            addressType
            defaultAddress
        }
        defaultAddress {
            id
            companyName
            address1
            address2
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation createCustomer {
    createCustomer(input: {
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
      	gender: "Male"
      	dateOfBirth: "11/07/1993"
        customerGroupId: 1
        phone: "987654321"
        notes: "This is dummy note, for newly created customer."
        status: true
    }) {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        dateOfBirth
        email
        phone
        password
        apiToken
        customerGroupId
        subscribedToNewsLetter
        isVerified
        token
        notes
        status
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        addresses {
            id
            customerId
            companyName
            firstName
            lastName
            address1
            address2
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
            vatId
            addressType
            defaultAddress
        }
        defaultAddress {
            id
            companyName
            address1
            address2
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation updateCustomer {
    updateCustomer(id: 15, input: {
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
      	gender: "Female"
      	dateOfBirth: "1996-05-10"
        customerGroupId: 2
        phone: "7001142256"
        status: true
    }) {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        dateOfBirth
        email
        phone
        notes
        password
        apiToken
        customerGroupId
        subscribedToNewsLetter
        isVerified
        token
        notes
        status
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        addresses {
            id
            customerId
            companyName
            firstName
            lastName
            address1
            address2
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
            vatId
            addressType
            defaultAddress
        }
        defaultAddress {
            id
            companyName
            address1
            address2
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

query customerAddresses {
    customerAddresses {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            customerId
            companyName
            firstName
            lastName
            address1
            address2
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
            vatId
            addressType
            defaultAddress
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

query customerAddress {
    customerAddress(id: 1) {
        id
        customerId
        companyName
        firstName
        lastName
        address1
        address2
        country
        state
        city
        postcode
        phone
        vatId
        addressType
        defaultAddress
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation createCustomerAddress {
    createCustomerAddress(input: {
        customerId: 16
        companyName: "Stark Industries"
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        gender: "Male"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
        address1: "3180 Bluff"
        address2: "Street"
        country: "US"
        state: "PA"
        city: "GLEN CAMPBELL"
        postcode: "15742"
        phone: "987654321"
        vatId: "INV12345678902"
        defaultAddress: true
    }) {
        id
        customerId
        companyName
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        email
        address1
        address2
        country
        state
        city
        postcode
        phone
        vatId
        addressType
        defaultAddress
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation updateCustomerAddress {
    updateCustomerAddress(id: 1, input: {
        customerId: 16
        companyName: "Bagisto"
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        gender: "Male"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
        address1: "3180 Bluff Street"
        address2: ""
        country: "IN"
        state: "UP"
        city: "Noida"
        postcode: "201301"
        phone: "987654321"
        vatId: "INV12342278902"
    }) {
        id
        customerId
        companyName
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        email
        address1
        address2
        country
        state
        city
        postcode
        phone
        vatId
        addressType
        defaultAddress
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}
